summary: The 'Second Chance for Moms Act of 2025' proposes amendments to the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act and the Public Health Service Act. It mandates a warning label on mifepristone packaging informing users that its effects can be counteracted with progesterone. It also requires the establishment of a 24/7 toll-free hotline providing information and referrals to providers offering abortion pill reversal services.
